text: iprahimitamum, avarotu iruntavarkalitamum, niccayamaka unkalukku or alakiya munmatiri irukkiratu, tam camukattaritam avarkal, "unkalai vittum, innum allahvaiyanri ninkal vanankukiravarraivittum, nankal niccayamaka ninkik kontom; unkalaiyum nankal nirakarittu vittom, anriyum ekanana allah oruvan mite ninkal nampikkai kollum varai, namakkum unkalukkumitaiyil pakaimaiyum, veruppum nirantaramaka erpattu vittana" enrarkal. Anal iprahim tam tantaiyai nokki, "allahvitattil unkalukkaka (avanutaiya vetanaiyiliruntu) etaiyum tatukka enakkuc cakti kitaiyatu, ayinum unkalukkaka nan avanitattil niccayamaka mannipput tetuven" enak kuriyatait tavira (marra ellavarrilum mun matiriyirukkiratu, anriyum, avar kurinar); "enkal iraiva!
